meanings.definition: A male given name, a diminutive of Bartholomew.
meanings.english_definition: A male given name, a short form of Bartholomew.

meanings.definition: Richard Bartle, a British writer and academic known for his work on multiplayer online role-playing games (MMORPGs).
meanings.english_definition: Richard Bartle, a British writer and academic known for his work on multiplayer online role-playing games (MMORPGs).

etymology.value: The surname is of English origin, likely derived from a diminutive of Bartholomew.
